exercises.name: Pistol Pete Shooting 101 A
exercises.description: Pistol Pete Maravich takes time to tell all about proper free throw shooting.
exercises.body: Pistol Pete Maravich takes time to tell all about proper free throw shooting.

exercises.name: INSTANTLY Improve Your Jump Shot With These 3 Shooting Drills!
exercises.description: Here are 3 shooting drills that will instantly improve your shooting.
exercises.body: Here are 3 shooting drills that will instantly improve your shooting. Along with the 3 shooting drills Coach Rocky also breaks down some important concepts to think about when shooting that will really improve your ability to shoot the basketball!

exercises.name: Kyle Korver Shooting Drills | Baseline Series | Basketball Shooting Drills
exercises.description: The Kyle Korver Baseline Shooting Drills series.
exercises.body: The Kyle Korver Baseline Shooting Drills series.l It's a staple for any elite shooter looking to improve their accuracy and shot quickness from the baseline. From preps to pros everyone should get their reps in on this! Use these drills to develop the lightning quick target location just like Kyle Korver uses off the catch! This drill is a must for anyone looking to improve.

exercises.name: JJ Redick Catch and Shoot Drill
exercises.description: Catch-and-Shoot drills
exercises.body: Redicks Rave: A good word to think of in Catch-and-Shoot is deception. You want to deceive your man so he doesnt have any idea where youre going off the screen.

exercises.name: How To: Improve Your Ball Handling - Daily 5 Minute Dribbling Routine - Pro Training
How To: The Top 4 Ball Handling Drills You MUST Be Doing!!
exercises.description: Coach Rock created 4 of the most intense ball handling drills yet and pushed Nike gear to the limit!
exercises.body: Coach Rock created 4 of the most intense ball handling drills yet and pushed Nike gear to the limit!

exercises.name: Steve Nash : 6 Minute NBA Ball Handling Workout Secrets | Point Guard Skills Workout
exercises.description: Watch as Steve Nash Teaches the fundamentals of what it take to become a NBA point guard. In this video Steve Nash shows us his NBA Ball Handling Workout Secrets as well and his go to crossovers.
exercises.body: Watch as Steve Nash Teaches the fundamentals of what it take to become a NBA point guard. In this video Steve Nash shows us his NBA Ball Handling Workout Secrets as well and his go to crossovers.

exercises.name: Top 5 Unstoppable Post Moves (Easy Buckets): Footwork for Centers and Power Forwards
exercises.description: So here is our Top 5 Unstoppable Post Moves. NBA superstars like Hakeem Olajuwon, Al Jefferson, Tim Duncan, Marc Gasol, Paul Gasol, Dwight Howard, and Anthony Davis all use these move to get the defense moving and to get a great look at the hoop. Once you master the footwork, you will be a deadly force inside the paint. These moves are especially important to athletes who play at the power forward and center positions.
exercises.body: So here is our Top 5 Unstoppable Post Moves. NBA superstars like Hakeem Olajuwon, Al Jefferson, Tim Duncan, Marc Gasol, Paul Gasol, Dwight Howard, and Anthony Davis all use these move to get the defense moving and to get a great look at the hoop. Once you master the footwork, you will be a deadly force inside the paint. These moves are especially important to athletes who play at the power forward and center positions.

exercises.name: Basketball Post Moves, Drills, & Tips For Low Post Players Like Hakeem Olajuwon
exercises.description: In this video you will learn how to execute post shooting. There are two main variations to this drill and can be done with or without a partner. If you don't have a partner you simple spin the ball to yourself.
exercises.body: In this video you will learn how to execute post shooting. There are two main variations to this drill and can be done with or without a partner. If you don't have a partner you simple spin the ball to yourself. So whether you are power forward or a center basketball post drills than add new moves and work on shooting at the same time are the kind of drills you need to be implementing today.

exercises.name: Basketball Drills For Post Players
exercises.description: Here are 5 different basketball drills for post players.
exercises.body: Here are 5 different basketball drills for post players.

exercises.name: Dwyane Wade Off-Ball Cuts (EASY BUCKETS): Basketball Moves
exercises.description: This is an awesome trick Dwyane Wade uses to get super easy buckets! Some of the most elite players in the NBA Dwyane Wade, Kobe Bryant, LeBron James, and Kevin Durant use these tricks to KILL their defenders and get easy points.This move is great for anyone looking to take advantage of their defenders breakdowns!
exercises.body: This is an awesome trick Dwyane Wade uses to get super easy buckets! Some of the most elite players in the NBA Dwyane Wade, Kobe Bryant, LeBron James, and Kevin Durant use these tricks to KILL their defenders and get easy points.This move is great for anyone looking to take advantage of their defenders breakdowns!

exercises.name: Kyle Korver Off-Ball Movement: NBA Shooting Secrets
exercises.description: So here is our new episode of NBA Shooting Secrets with Kyle Korver. Today we break down the top ways Kyle Korver uses off ball movement to seek out and find shots. Learn how to apply these shooting mechanics to your game and watch the ball go in the hole!
exercises.body: So here is our new episode of NBA Shooting Secrets with Kyle Korver. Today we break down the top ways Kyle Korver uses off ball movement to seek out and find shots. Learn how to apply these shooting mechanics to your game and watch the ball go in the hole!

exercises.body: This video will talk about basketball offense and getting open.

exercises.name: Defense Drills For Basketball- How To Play Half Court Defense!

exercises.description: The 'Tips, Skills, Drills' series continues with a lesson on the Pick and Roll from P.J. Carlesimo, with help from NBA stars Paul George, Anthony Davis and Kyrie Irving.
